summary: Deletes db.json, generates static files with Hexo, starts a local web server on port 8021 for serving the generated files.

details.comment: Deletes db.json, generates static files with Hexo, starts a local web server on port 8021 for serving the generated files.
details.content:
rm db.json
hexo generate
cd public
python3 -m http.server 8021
